javadoc.text: * PLocator provides an abstraction for locating points. Subclasses such * as PNodeLocator and PBoundsLocator specialize this behavior by locating * points on nodes, or on the bounds of nodes. *
javadoc.author: Jesse Grosjean

javadoc.text: * Default constructor provided for subclasses. Does nothing by itself.
* Locates the point this locator is responsible for finding, and stores it * in dstPoints. Should dstPoints be null, it will create a new point and * return it.
javadoc.param: dstPoint output parameter to store the located point

javadoc.text: * Locates the X component of the position this locator finds.
* Locates the Y component of the position this locator finds.
